ModMetaData.name: Pick Up And Haul 1.6 Forked
ModMetaData.author: Teemo
ModMetaData.description:
"Greatest hauling mod ever" - Chicken Plucker
v1.1.2¼
I updated the mod to 1.6 and it seems to work pretty well. Please let me know if you get errors, preferably in github or discord https://github.com/pkp24/PickupAndHaul https://discord.gg/2UUaxC54bs
I created a discord server for bug reporting and beta testing. https://discord.gg/2UUaxC54bs If you join, make sure you select your roles.
Unfortunately Uuugggg has passed away, I've been talking with Meme Goddess about working together to continue PUAH. Since mine changes some functionality to fix some bugs and improve performance it'll be Forked while theirs is Continued as they'll be trying to keep it mostly the same.
Pick Up And Haul Continued: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3526273433
Original Pick Up And Haul: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1279012058
"Greatest hauling mod ever" - Chicken Plucker
v1.1.2¼
Colonists will gather stuff in their inventory, then haul it all to a stockpile.
This hauling mod will greatly increase hauling efficiency, because pawns can now carry more than one gun or t-shirt. Those smart and intelligent colonists can use their inventory!
Safe to add to existing games. Fully compatible with Combat Extended. Credits and thanks: - AlexTD, for his direct contributions - erdelf, Zorba, Why_is_that and Dingo for code and advice (yet again!) - Chicken Plucker, for the preview image - Brrainz, for the amazing Harmony library - mlie, for keeping it warm
- Spanish translation, courtesy of mora145 and 53N4 - Russian translation, courtesy of HanabishiRecca - Korean translation, courtesy of Defo and Pu Rn Ha Ni - Chinese translation, courtesy of 烨灬 and shiuanyue - PortugueseBrazilian translation, courtesy of Bambinoff/Edu - Italian translation, courtesy of kenciccio - German translation, courtesy of Prism - French translation, courtesy of qux
